content: Hi I am using the web validator (https://inferno.healthit.gov/validator/) with the us-core-allergyintolerance profile and receive "Error loading /root/.fhir/packages/hl7.fhir.r5.core#4.4.0/package/ConceptMap-101.json: property identifier is a class com.google.gson.JsonObject looking for an Array on line 1" which sounds like an error on the validator's end. Has anyone else had this before?
